mapper.select: SELECT r.REPLY_ID AS REPLY_ID, r.UPPER_REPLY_ID AS UPPER_REPLY_ID, r.CONTENT AS CONTENT, r.WRITE_DATE AS WRITE_DATE, r.UPDATE_DATE AS UPDATE_DATE, r.BOARD_ID AS BOARD_ID, m.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME, r.member_id AS MEMBER_ID FROM REPLY r JOIN member m ON r.member_id = m.member_id WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId} GROUP BY r.REPLY_ID, r.UPPER_REPLY_ID, r.CONTENT, r.WRITE_DATE, r.UPDATE_DATE, r.BOARD_ID, m.NICKNAME, r.member_id ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(REPLY_ID), 0) + 1 FROM REPLY
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_ID, UPPER_REPLY_ID, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID) VALUES(#{replyId}, #{upperReplyId}, #{content}, sysdate, null, #{boardId}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT title, write_date, FROM REPLY ORDER BY write_date OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{end - start + 1} ROWS ONLY
